bibl.title: P. Oxy. XVI 1964: A Lease of a Room from Byzantine Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: Lease drawn up in the form of a hypomnema, typical for the region of Oxyrhynchus. It is set to start on 29 August 518. - Pp. 191-192: Appendix. Additions to the list of leases of buildings dating from the reign of Diocletian published by: Hansgünter MÜLLER, Untersuchungen zur μίσθωσις von Gebäuden im Recht der gräko-ägyptischen Papyri = Erlanger Juristische Abhandlungen. 33 (Köln - Berlin - Bonn - München, 1985) pp. 350ff.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, P. Oxy. XVI 1964: A Lease of a Room from Byzantine Oxyrhynchus.
ZPE 132 (2000) pp. 189-192, 1 tabl. et pl. II.

Lease drawn up in the form of a hypomnema, typical for the region of Oxyrhynchus. It is set to start on 29 August 518. - Pp. 191-192: Appendix. Additions to the list of leases of buildings dating from the reign of Diocletian published by: Hansgünter MÜLLER, Untersuchungen zur μίσθωσις von Gebäuden im Recht der gräko-ägyptischen Papyri = Erlanger Juristische Abhandlungen. 33 (Köln - Berlin - Bonn - München, 1985) pp. 350ff.
